Adaptive Skin.name: Peau adaptative
Adaptive Skin.description: La cible peut vivre confortablement dans des environnements chauds ou froids.

Addle Brain.name: Brouille cerveau
Addle Brain.description: La cible doit réussir une sauvegarde de VOL ou tomber à 0 VOL pendant 1 heure.

Animal Call.name: Invocation d'animaux
Animal Call.description: Invoque une créature banale. Elle n'a aucune loyauté envers vous ou vos alliés.

Anti-Magic Globe.name: Globe Anti-magie
Anti-Magic Globe.description: Une fine enveloppe de protection magique entoure une petite zone autour du lanceur. Pour chaque minute supplémentaire où le globe est actif, il subit une Fatigue supplémentaire.

Arachnid's Finesse.name: Maîtrise de l'arachnide
Arachnid's Finesse.description: La cible peut marcher sur les murs et les plafonds.

Arcane Arrow.name: Flèche arcanique
Arcane Arrow.description: Une énergie verte jaillit de vos doigts, infligeant 1d6 points de dégâts et ignorant les armures ordinaires.

Arcane Confinement.name: Confinement arcanique
Arcane Confinement.description: La cible est attachée par une corde magique, elle peut parler, mais rien de plus..

Arcane Epistle.name: Épître arcanique
Arcane Epistle.description: Vous écrivez une lettre que seul le lecteur désigné peut comprendre.

Arcane Fireworks.name: Feux d'artifice arcaniques
Arcane Fireworks.description: La flamme ciblée se transforme en une grande conflagration de chaleur, de lumière et de son.

Arcane Stain.name: Tâche arcanique
Arcane Stain.description: Inscrit une rune invisible que vous pouvez sentir. Perte de 1d4 WIL si elle est retirée.

Architect's Eye.name: Regard d'Architecte
Architect's Eye.description: Toutes les portes cachées dans un rayon de 20 mètres s'illuminent comme si elles étaient en feu..

Architect's Perfection.name: Perfection d'Architecte
Architect's Perfection.description: Créez un mur, un sol ou un plafond holographique qui a l'air absolument réel.

Astral Step.name: Pas astral
Astral Step.description: Vous et toutes autres personnes qui vous touchent êtes instantanément transportés vers un endroit où vous êtes déjà allé.

Banishment.name: Bannissement
Banishment.description: Sauvegarde de VOL ou la créature retourne dans son plan d'origine.

Become Unseen.name: Devenir invisible
Become Unseen.description: La cible devient invisible pendant 1 heure, et peut toujours utiliser ses capacités et attaquer sans être détectée. Ensuite, elle passe en privation.

Beguilement.name: Séduction
Beguilement.description: L'humanoïde ciblé doit faire une sauvegarde de VOL ou est contrôlé par télépathie.

Bewildering Fog.name: Brouillard déroutant
Bewildering Fog.description: Un brouillard brumeux vous entoure dans un rayon de 6 mètres. Les attaques à l'intérieur de la brume sont affaiblies

Blazing Defense.name: Défense ardente
Blazing Defense.description: Vous créez un bouclier de flammes (+1 Armure, 1d6 dégâts). Le feu ne peut pas vous blesser.

Blessing.name: Bénédiction
Blessing.description: Les attaques de la cible sont améliorées et les attaques non-Explosives sont affaiblies contre elle jusqu'à ce qu'elle subisse des dégâts.

Bolster.name: Soutien
Bolster.description: Une personne que vous pouvez voir est enhardie par vos paroles pendant quelques minutes : ses attaques sont renforcées et elle ne peut pas être en privation.

Bound.name: Bondir
Bound.description: La cible peut faire un seul saut vers n'importe quel endroit qu'elle peut voir.

Boundless Message.name: Message sans frontières
Boundless Message.description: Délivre une seule phrase à une créature instantanément, quelle que soit la distance.

Breath Soup.name: Bouffée d'haleine
Breath Soup.description: Bloque la vision et ralentit les mouvements.

Burning Missile.name: Missile brulant
Burning Missile.description: Vous tirez un missile acide qui inflige 1d6 points de dégâts à une cible pour chaque round où il n'est pas rincé.

Burnishing Bubble.name: Bulle polie
Burnishing Bubble.description: La cible est entourée d'une sphère impénétrable qui roule sur le sol, à moins qu'elle ne réussisse une sauvegarde de DEX.

Calcify.name: Calcifier
Calcify.description: L'objet cible se transforme en pierre au contact du lanceur de sorts. Les cibles vivantes doivent faire une sauvegarde de FOR.

Catsense.name: Sens félin
Catsense.description: La cible a des sens aiguisés pendant l'heure qui suit, surtout la nuit.

Chilling Graze.name: Toucher glacial
Chilling Graze.description: La cible perd 1d4+1 FOR et est en privation.

Cinder Flesh.name: Chair de cendre
Cinder Flesh.description: Des faisceaux d'énergie brûlent les ennemis (1d10 dégâts explosifs) en ligne droite.

Circle of Arcane Protection.name: Cercle de protection arcanique
Circle of Arcane Protection.description: Les êtres magiques ou divins ne peuvent pas entrer dans un cercle de 3 mètres.

Cleanse.name: Purification
Cleanse.description: Les aliments pourris ou empoisonnés deviennent comestibles.

Cold Spray.name: Spray froid
Cold Spray.description: Un jet d'air froid fait d6 dégâts à 6 mètres dans une direction.

Conceal Object.name: Cacher l'objet
Conceal Object.description: Masque un objet contre la divination ou la scrutation.

Conquer Gravity.name: Maîtrise de la gravité
Conquer Gravity.description: La cible se déplace vers le haut ou vers le bas en fonction de vos envie.

Cosmic Fingertips.name: Bout des doigts cosmiques
Cosmic Fingertips.description: Vos mains sculptent la pierre, la roche ou les minéraux dans la forme que vous souhaitez.

Coup de Grâce.name: Coup de Grâce
Coup de Grâce.description: La prochaine attaque d'un allié ignore l'armure et inflige des dégâts directement sur la FOR de sa cible.

Craft from Clay.name: Craft from Clay
Craft from Clay.description: Any natural, earthen target is transformed (rock to mud, lava to rock, etc).

Create Unlife.name: Create Unlife
Create Unlife.description: Creates 1d4 undead skeletons and zombies from corpses. WIL save every hour to control them.

Cure-All.name: Cure-All
Cure-All.description: A single illness or disease dissipates at your touch.

Curse of the Sightless.name: Curse of the Sightless
Curse of the Sightless.description: Anyone within eyesight must make a WIL save or be blinded.

Curse Unlife.name: Curse Unlife
Curse Unlife.description: Deals 1d4+2 STR loss to one undead, ignoring armor and resistances.

Cute Ink.name: Cute Ink
Cute Ink.description: A single page in a book can be altered to hide its true content.

Darksight.name: Darksight
Darksight.description: Target can see 60 ft. in total darkness.

Death's Breath.name: Death's Breath
Death's Breath.description: You summon a poisonous cloud (d6 STR loss) you can control.

Devil's Comedian.name: Devil's Comedian
Devil's Comedian.description: WIL save or target laughs uncontrollably, unable to take any action.

Disaster Fluid.name: Disaster Fluid
Disaster Fluid.description: Anything in a 10ft square becomes slippery; DEX save to avoid slipping.

Disrupt Scry.name: Disrupt Scry
Disrupt Scry.description: Future divinations of one creature or object are misled according to your will.

Doppleganger.name: Doppleganger
Doppleganger.description: You spawn 1d6 decoy duplicates of someone you touch. Decoys are dispelled with a touch.

Dreampoison.name: Dreampoison
Dreampoison.description: Target is deprived after suffering a night of bad dreams.

Dreamtalker.name: Dreamtalker
Dreamtalker.description: Sends a message to anyone currently asleep.

Easy Descent.name: Easy Descent
Easy Descent.description: Objects or creatures nearby fall very slowly.

Edifice.name: Edifice
Edifice.description: You summon a stone wall up to 20ft wide that you can control.

Energize Rope.name: Energize Rope
Energize Rope.description: A rope-like objects moves at your command.

Ensorcelled.name: Ensorcelled
Ensorcelled.description: Creatures are enraptured for a few minutes unless they pass a WIL save.

Envision.name: Envision
Envision.description: Spies on a target you have met, even across vast distances. On a WIL save, they can feel your presence.

Ephemeral Audio.name: Ephemeral Audio
Ephemeral Audio.description: Point to a spot. Anyone nearby hears a sound you choose at any volume.

Epidemic.name: Epidemic
Epidemic.description: Infects target with disease, which spreads until the source of magic is destroyed.

Extraplanar Convocation.name: Extraplanar Convocation
Extraplanar Convocation.description: Summons any extraplanar being onto your plane. It holds no loyalty towards you or your allies.

Extraplanar Request.name: Extraplanar Request
Extraplanar Request.description: Ask a single question of a random extraplanar entity.

Feline Dexterity.name: Feline Dexterity
Feline Dexterity.description: Target becomes limber, lithe and as fast as quicksilver.

Find Virulence.name: Find Virulence
Find Virulence.description: Detects poison in any creature or object within 30ft.

Fire Curse.name: Fire Curse
Fire Curse.description: An object you touch is imbued with a hidden flame-trap dealing 1d4+2 STR loss.

Firey Missile.name: Firey Missile
Firey Missile.description: A bow you touch can fire flaming arrows (1d10 damage) for one minute.

Fish Lung.name: Fish Lung
Fish Lung.description: A target can breathe underwater until they surface again.

Flicker.name: Flicker
Flicker.description: Target randomly vanishes and reappears once at will.

Fog of Nausea.name: Fog of Nausea
Fog of Nausea.description: A cloud of nauseating vapors pours out from the Spellbook's pages. Anyone nearby makes a STR save or vomit uncontrollably.

Fold Portal.name: Fold Portal
Fold Portal.description: A door you touch opens into another door you've stepped through before until it is shut again.

Foolishness.name: Foolishness
Foolishness.description: A target you touch becomes vulnerable to wild mood swings, sweeping conclusions and silly behavior. They also lose 1d6 WIL for 24 hours (down to a minimum of 1).

Fortify.name: Fortify
Fortify.description: Damage from heat, ice, acid or electricity are impaired against a target for the next hour.

Gale.name: Gale
Gale.description: You summon an impenetrable wall of energy up to 15ft wide.

Ghost Whisper.name: Ghost Whisper
Ghost Whisper.description: You and a sympathetic ally are linked, able to converse in short sentences for an hour.

Gift of Flight.name: Gift of Flight
Gift of Flight.description: Target can fly for a short while.

Glacier.name: Glacier
Glacier.description: You create a wall of ice (15 HP, 3 Armor) around a creature you choose.

Gorgon's Gaze.name: Gorgon's Gaze
Gorgon's Gaze.description: Target is transformed into a statue on a failed WIL save. A success reverses the spell; holder must pass a WIL save or the book is destroyed.

Great Ball of Fire.name: Great Ball of Fire
Great Ball of Fire.description: You fire a ball of flame (1d10 damage) up to 20 feet away.

Hand of the Protector.name: Hand of the Protector
Hand of the Protector.description: A giant, floating hand blocks all damage from a single opponent until you are safe from danger.

Healing Grace.name: Healing Grace
Healing Grace.description: A target heals 1d6 STR, and you become deprived until you take the time to mediate, pray or sleep.

Heatless Torch.name: Heatless Torch
Heatless Torch.description: Turns any object into a permanent, heatless torch.

Hedgemagick.name: Hedgemagick
Hedgemagick.description: You perform a minor magical trick (create flame, wind, light or sound).

Hide Mind.name: Hide Mind
Hide Mind.description: The next person to scry your mind or your whereabouts is fooled.

Hoodwink Monster.name: Hoodwink Monster
Hoodwink Monster.description: Target monster makes a WIL save or treats you as an ally.

Hoodwink Person.name: Hoodwink Person
Hoodwink Person.description: Target becomes a friend until out of sight.

Hovering Protection.name: Hovering Protection
Hovering Protection.description: A hovering, transparent disk materializes around an ally granting 1 Armor.

Ice Ray.name: Ice Ray
Ice Ray.description: Ice and snow flow from your fingerprints, dealing 1d8 damage (blast) in a straight line.

Ill Fate.name: Ill Fate
Ill Fate.description: Target automatically fails next their next save.

Illusory Landscape.name: Illusory Landscape
Illusory Landscape.description: You can make one type of terrain appear like another.

Induce Despair.name: Induce Despair
Induce Despair.description: Target must pass a WIL save or its attacks are impaired.

Induce Horror.name: Induce Horror
Induce Horror.description: Target makes a WIL save or flees.

Inferno.name: Inferno
Inferno.description: You summon a flaming wall up to 15ft wide. Anyone passing through suffers 1d6 STR loss.

Influence.name: Influence
Influence.description: Target gains armor 3 but running and swimming are impossible.

Kraken's Curse.name: Kraken's Curse
Kraken's Curse.description: Tentacles grapple all within 20 ft, STR save to break free.

Lamp's Hue.name: Lamp's Hue
Lamp's Hue.description: Target object shines like a torch for one hour.

Latch.name: Latch
Latch.description: An unlocked box, cabinet or door opens or closes at your command.

Lichsense.name: Lichsense
Lichsense.description: You feel any undead within 60ft. WIL save to avoid detection by intelligent undead.

Light Show.name: Light Show
Light Show.description: You control a dazzling display of light and color.

Lightning Strike.name: Lightning Strike
Lightning Strike.description: Electricity flings from your fingertips doing 1d12 damage (blast) in a line.

Linguist.name: Linguist
Linguist.description: For the next hour you can speak and understand any mundane language.

Magic Seal.name: Magic Seal
Magic Seal.description: Magically locks a door, portal or chest.

Major Genesis.name: Major Genesis
Major Genesis.description: Creates an object of nonliving stone or metal no greater than 5 cubic foot in size.

Manic Fury.name: Manic Fury
Manic Fury.description: A target's attacks are enhanced. They must make a WIL save after a successful killing or lose control, attacking anyone in sight.

Masquerade.name: Masquerade
Masquerade.description: You assume the likeness of a similar creature you have seen.

Master Undead.name: Master Undead
Master Undead.description: Undead creatures obey your command. Intelligent undead make a WIL save.

Mental Tripwire.name: Mental Tripwire
Mental Tripwire.description: Intruders set off an alarm audible only to you.

Mind Bond.name: Mind Bond
Mind Bond.description: Two allies can communicate via a mental link for the rest of the day.

Mind Reader.name: Mind Reader
Mind Reader.description: You can see or hear any person you have met before.

Miniaturize.name: Miniaturize
Miniaturize.description: An object shrinks to one tenth its size.

Minor Aegis.name: Minor Aegis
Minor Aegis.description: A target you touch ignores the next instance of harm from a specific source.

Minor Genesis.name: Minor Genesis
Minor Genesis.description: Creates an object of nonliving matter no greater than one cubic foot in size.

Mirage.name: Mirage
Mirage.description: You summon a noiseless & simple illusion of your choice.

Molasses Veins.name: Molasses Veins
Molasses Veins.description: A single target moves at half speed.

Murky Bubble.name: Murky Bubble
Murky Bubble.description: You create a bubble supernatural shadow within a 20ft radius.

Necrotic Touch.name: Necrotic Touch
Necrotic Touch.description: Target must DEX save or is paralyzed.

Obfuscate.name: Obfuscate
Obfuscate.description: Target cannot be observed either through divination or scrying.

Obscuring Mist.name: Obscuring Mist
Obscuring Mist.description: A rolling fog obscures vision in a 300ft radius.

Opaque Cover.name: Opaque Cover
Opaque Cover.description: Details about your person become obscured and unmemorable.

Orb of Ignus.name: Orb of Ignus
Orb of Ignus.description: You control a floating ball of fire (1d8 damage) for a short while.

Orb of Immortality.name: Orb of Immortality
Orb of Immortality.description: Mundane attacks cannot harm anyone within a 10ft radius, or vice-versa.

Otherwordly Pet.name: Otherwordly Pet
Otherwordly Pet.description: Summons an unintelligent extraplanar creature up to the size of a small dog. It holds no loyalty towards you or your allies.

Otherworldly Gate.name: Otherworldly Gate
Otherworldly Gate.description: Opens a portal to another reality. It works in both directions.

Paincurrent.name: Paincurrent
Paincurrent.description: An arc of electricity passes from your fingertips to a target you touch. They take 1d8 damage (1d12 if wearing metal armor).

Passage.name: Passage
Passage.description: Creates a temporary passage through wood, stone or brick.

Passive Invisibility.name: Passive Invisibility
Passive Invisibility.description: Target is invisible until they attempt harm.

Peeping Warlock.name: Peeping Warlock
Peeping Warlock.description: You control a pair of floating eyes so long as yours remain closed.

Perfect Illusion.name: Perfect Illusion
Perfect Illusion.description: Creates an image with sound, smell and thermal effects, activated according to a trigger you choose. Touching the image or making a successful WIL save will reveal the illusion.

Perfect Preservation.name: Perfect Preservation
Perfect Preservation.description: A weapon you touch becomes immune to wear, mundane damage or elemental effects. The spell wears off after a day.

Phantom Hound.name: Phantom Hound
Phantom Hound.description: A ghostly canine (4 HP, bite (1d4)) obeys your commands for up to one hour.

Phase Anchor.name: Phase Anchor
Phase Anchor.description: Binds an extraplanar creature to your will until it performs a task specific task, after which they must pass a WIL save to escape (good luck).

Phase Sneak.name: Phase Sneak
Phase Sneak.description: Anyone within a 10ft radius is rendered invisible.

Phase Touch.name: Phase Touch
Phase Touch.description: A disembodied, floating hand obeys your whims but is immaterial. The next Spellbook, ability or item that relies on touch now works from a distance.

Philolomancy.name: Philolomancy
Philolomancy.description: You understand all spoken and written languages.

Pocket Container.name: Pocket Container
Pocket Container.description: Summons a chest from an immaterial plane. It holds up to 6 items. The chest is dismissed at will.

Pocket Sun.name: Pocket Sun
Pocket Sun.description: You create a halo of bright light in a 60ft radius.

Prisma Shard.name: Prisma Shard
Prisma Shard.description: An array of hypnotic lights fascinate nearby creatures, unless they pass a WIL save.

Profane Reveal.name: Profane Reveal
Profane Reveal.description: Target must WIL save or its attacks are impaired. Target an empty space to reveal invisible objects or creatures.

Psychic Eye.name: Psychic Eye
Psychic Eye.description: Invisible floating eye allowing you to observe a single location as present.

Psychokinesis.name: Psychokinesis
Psychokinesis.description: Magically moves an object up to half your weight.

Puppeteer.name: Puppeteer
Puppeteer.description: You can throw your voice a great distance away

Purge Text.name: Purge Text
Purge Text.description: Mundane or magical writing vanishes at your touch.

Pyramid of Passivity.name: Pyramid of Passivity
Pyramid of Passivity.description: Target creatures must make a DEX save or their attacks are impaired.

Pyschic Touch.name: Pyschic Touch
Pyschic Touch.description: You can hear target's surface thoughts, so long as you touch them.

Rat-Tat-Tat.name: Rat-Tat-Tat
Rat-Tat-Tat.description: Loudly opens a locked or magically sealed door or chest.

Ravenless Message.name: Ravenless Message
Ravenless Message.description: You send a short message 1 mile that anyone along its path can hear.

Reject Unlife.name: Reject Unlife
Reject Unlife.description: Nearby undead are immobilized for 30 seconds or until you take another action.

Remembered Voice.name: Remembered Voice
Remembered Voice.description: A spot you mark becomes the trigger for a supernatural recording of your voice, delivering a short message of your choice.

Reverie.name: Reverie
Reverie.description: Targets become dazed for a moment, as if lost in daydream.

Runic Harm.name: Runic Harm
Runic Harm.description: A rune you draw causes great pain to the reader, who must WIL save or scream until they pass out (1d4 WIL loss). A successful save destroys the rune.

Runic Slumber.name: Runic Slumber
Runic Slumber.description: A rune you draw puts the reader into a magical sleep that lasts 1d6 hours.

Safe Haven.name: Safe Haven
Safe Haven.description: You summon a floating, invisible refuge for 8 hours. It fits up to 8 people comfortably.

Scintillate.name: Scintillate
Scintillate.description: Target must WIL save or their attacks become impaired.

Scry Creature.name: Scry Creature
Scry Creature.description: Indicates the precise location of a familiar creature.

Scry Object.name: Scry Object
Scry Object.description: Indicates the precise location of an object, known or otherwise.

Scrying Ward.name: Scrying Ward
Scrying Ward.description: For 24 hours you become aware of any magical eavesdropping.

Secret Attaché.name: Secret Attaché
Secret Attaché.description: You summon an invisible creature of great power that obeys your every command. Reading from other Spellbooks dispels the creature.

Shelter.name: Shelter
Shelter.description: Creates a standing edifice that can shelter up to 10 creatures, disappearing after 24 hours.

Shrinking Cant.name: Shrinking Cant
Shrinking Cant.description: A humanoid creature you touch halves in size.

Signal.name: Signal
Signal.description: Sends up a flare that can be seen for some distance.

Simple Illusion.name: Simple Illusion
Simple Illusion.description: Creates a simple image with sound. A cursory investigation will reveal the illusory image.

Sinister Flame.name: Sinister Flame
Sinister Flame.description: Target's palms are lined with flames (1d4+1 STR loss) for one minute.

Sinister Polymorph.name: Sinister Polymorph
Sinister Polymorph.description: WIL save or target is transformed into a harmless animal.

Skillfull Repair.name: Skillfull Repair
Skillfull Repair.description: You make minor repairs to a nonliving object.

Sky Raft.name: Sky Raft
Sky Raft.description: You summon a 3ft wide floating disk that holds up to 100lbs.

Solar Portal.name: Solar Portal
Solar Portal.description: Sends an extraplanar message to all beings that wish to enter your plane. You have no choice which being answers and it holds no loyalty to you or your allies.

Sonic Shattering.name: Sonic Shattering
Sonic Shattering.description: A sonic wave causes 1d6 STR loss to susceptible objects or crystalline creatures, ignoring armor.

Sorcerer's Lock.name: Sorcerer's Lock
Sorcerer's Lock.description: Any door (magical or otherwise) is held shut until you leave its vicinity.

Soul Annex.name: Soul Annex
Soul Annex.description: Target's spirit is caged within their body and replaced with the caster's. If the body is slain the original soul departs, but the caster must pass a WIL save to return to their body.

Steer's Strength.name: Steer's Strength
Steer's Strength.description: Target's strength triples; unarmed attacks are enhanced.

Strength Tap.name: Strength Tap
Strength Tap.description: A target you touch loses 1d6 STR, which is transferred to you (up to your max STR).

Stumbling Steps.name: Stumbling Steps
Stumbling Steps.description: A target you touch becomes deprived and loses 1 STR.

Stupefaction.name: Stupefaction
Stupefaction.description: Target temporarily loses sense of place and time. WIL save to overcome.

Summon Elemental.name: Summon Elemental
Summon Elemental.description: A being of fire, wire, earth, or wind manifests from available matter to perform a single task for the caster. It follows this command against its will.

Sway Will.name: Sway Will
Sway Will.description: A target is compelled to follow a stated course of action, without understanding why.

Temporary Reprieve.name: Temporary Reprieve
Temporary Reprieve.description: Target regains any lost STR, but loses it again after a few minutes.

Terrify.name: Terrify
Terrify.description: Targets within eyesight must pass a WIL save or flee.

Terrifying Illusion.name: Terrifying Illusion
Terrifying Illusion.description: A target is hunted by a terrible creature only they can see. Its attacks do 1d12 damage; on Critical Damage they must pass a WIL save or become catatonic.

Thief's Bane.name: Thief's Bane
Thief's Bane.description: An object appears trapped, even to an experienced thief.

Thwart the Elements.name: Thwart the Elements
Thwart the Elements.description: Damage from energy blasts are impaired against a target for the next hour.

Tongue of the Blue Serpent.name: Tongue of the Blue Serpent
Tongue of the Blue Serpent.description: Rust-colored, serpentine letters materialize on a surface you choose. Anyone reading these words becomes immobilized unless they succeed a WIL save.

Torrential Moat.name: Torrential Moat
Torrential Moat.description: You summon a powerful wind that deflects arrows, smaller creatures, and noxious gases.

Toxic Blast.name: Toxic Blast
Toxic Blast.description: A small orb of acid deals 1d6 blast damage to a target.

Transform Aura.name: Transform Aura
Transform Aura.description: Target's aura is made non-magical or vice-versa.

True Name.name: True Name
True Name.description: Determines the properties of a magical item you touch.

Trueshift.name: Trueshift
Trueshift.description: A willing target takes on a new form (keeping only their WIL), but must pass a WIL save to shift out.

Twilight Steed.name: Twilight Steed
Twilight Steed.description: Summons an arcane steed that never tires, but dissipates within daylight.

Ultimate Sacrifice.name: Ultimate Sacrifice
Ultimate Sacrifice.description: The book's holder transfer's their life force into a corpse, reviving both body and soul.

Uncurse.name: Uncurse
Uncurse.description: A person or object you touch is freed from a curse or nefarious spell.

Undefinable Target.name: Undefinable Target
Undefinable Target.description: An ally becomes immune to mundane ranged attacks for one round.

Undeniable Courage.name: Undeniable Courage
Undeniable Courage.description: Target passes next WIL save and their attacks are enhanced.

Unflappable Endurance.name: Unflappable Endurance
Unflappable Endurance.description: Target does not take Fatigue from non-magical activities or become deprived until their next rest.

Vermin Plague.name: Vermin Plague
Vermin Plague.description: Summons a swarm of bats, rats, spiders or similar creatures of your choice. They are harmless but distracting and hold no loyalty towards you or your allies.

Vines of Ichor.name: Vines of Ichor
Vines of Ichor.description: You spread sticky spiderwebs on the walls, floor and ceilings within a 20ft radius.

Warrior's Edge.name: Warrior's Edge
Warrior's Edge.description: Target weapon is enhanced, and victim automatically fails a critical damage save.

Windborn.name: Windborn
Windborn.description: You direct a powerful wind in a straight line, strong enough to blow over small boulders.

Winter's Woe.name: Winter's Woe
Winter's Woe.description: An icy storm assails multiple targets, obscuring visibility and making the ground icy and treacherous.

Witch Sight.name: Witch Sight
Witch Sight.description: Magical auras become visible to you for one hour.

Wizard's Exit.name: Wizard's Exit
Wizard's Exit.description: You and and anyone you touch can flee to safety at double speed.

Wizard's Grasp.name: Wizard's Grasp
Wizard's Grasp.description: You control a phantasmal hand that can lift up to 5 pounds.

Wizard's Haven.name: Wizard's Haven
Wizard's Haven.description: A small, walled-in area cannot be scryed.

Wizardsniff.name: Wizardsniff
Wizardsniff.description: You can feel any magic within a 60ft radius.

Word of Pain.name: Word of Pain
Word of Pain.description: A single phrase from your lips does 1d12 blast damage. Affected targets are also deafened.
